Sentencas: Applying mixed oxygen ionic and electronic conducting (MIEC) oxides as the cathode offers a promising solution to enhance the performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the phase instability in CO2-containing air and sluggish oxygen reduction activity of MIEC cathodes remain a long-term challenge for optimizing the electrochemical performance of SOFCs.
Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Herein, a heterovalent co-doping strategy is proposed to enhance the oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance of SOFCs cathodes, which can be demonstrated by developing a novel BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-delta (BCF)-based MIEC oxide, BaCo0.6Fe0.2Sn0.1Y0.1O3-delta(BCFSY).
Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition to improving the stability of BCF-based perovskites, this strategy achieves an optimized balance of ionic mobility and oxygen vacancies due to the synergies between the effects of the co-dopants.
Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Compared with single-doped materials, BCFSY exhibits improved CO2 tolerance and considerably higher ORR activity, which is reflected in a significantly lower polarization resistance of 0.15 Omega cm(2) at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of this work provide an efficient tactic for designing electrode materials for SOFCs.
Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells
Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Sn and Y co-doped BaCo0.6Fe0.4O3-δ cathodes with enhanced oxygen reduction activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cells
